hero.description: Where sophistication meets professionalism. Each project is an expression of care and excellence.

slides.title: Rafael Miranda
slides.subtitle: Image, Aesthetics and Experience.
slides.text: Rafael works in a multidisciplinary way uniting personal image, design and aesthetics in everything he does. His work is guided by attention to detail, care with presentation and creation of remarkable visual and human experiences. More than services, he delivers presence, identity and comfort, always with a modern and professional look.

slides.title: Model & Personal Image
slides.subtitle: Presence, aesthetics and authenticity.
slides.text: As a model, Rafael works on image consciously and strategically. Each shoot is designed to convey identity, style and professionalism, exploring aesthetics, posture and expression. His focus goes beyond appearance: it's about communicating confidence and personality in every visual detail.

slides.title: Design & Creativity
slides.subtitle: Visuals that communicate and connect.
slides.text: In design, Rafael transforms ideas into clear, modern and functional visual solutions. Focusing on aesthetics, organization and user experience, his projects combine creativity and strategy to strengthen brands, personal images and high-level visual presentations.

slides.title: Aesthetics & Presentation
slides.subtitle: Care with every detail.
slides.text: Aesthetics is a central pillar of Rafael's work. From personal image to setting and visual presentation, everything is thought out to convey harmony, sophistication and well-being. His knowledge in aesthetics complements his roles as model, designer and host.

slides.title: Hosting & Experience
slides.subtitle: Comfort, care and hospitality.
slides.text: Beyond creative areas, Rafael offers hosting as a complete experience. The space is designed to provide comfort, organization and well-being, always with attention to detail and care for each person received. More than a place to stay, a welcoming experience.
